#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int t;
    long long int n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        if(n==1) printf("0\n");
        else
        {
        	if(n%2==0) printf("%lld\n",n*(n/2)-1);
        	else printf("%lld\n",n*(n/2)+((n/2)-1));
    	}
    }
    return 0;
}
